title: Small Businesses, the US Economy’s Engines of Growth
description: In this episode, we dive into why the Postal Service is the one-stop shop for small businesses. We’ll learn more about the marketing and advertising help and package and shipping services tailored for small businesses. Join us as we talk with Peter Timko, the Postal Service’s Manager of Small Business Solutions, and Susan McGowan, a Marketing Specialist for Small Business Solutions, to talk about all the tools and services available to support small businesses.
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
content:encoded: In this episode, we dive into why the Postal Service is the one-stop shop for small businesses. We’ll learn more about the marketing and advertising help and package and shipping services tailored for small businesses. Join us as we talk with Peter Timko, the Postal Service’s Manager of Small Business Solutions, and Susan McGowan, a Marketing Specialist for Small Business Solutions, to talk about all the tools and services available to support small businesses.
itunes:title: Small Businesses, the US Economy’s Engines of Growth

itunes:summary: This week on Mailin’ It, we talk about the tools and services available for small businesses with Peter Timko and Susan McGowan from the Postal Service's Small Business Solutions group. Join us as we learn how the Postal Service supports small businesses across the nation with marketing support, shipping solutions, and much more!
